translated: Cité de la Mer is a maritime museum and recreation area located in the old harbor station of Cherbourg, which once housed the passengers of the great ocean liners.
original: La Cité de la Mer est un musée maritime et espace de loisirs installé dans l'ancienne gare maritime de Cherbourg, qui accueillait jadis les passagers des grands paquebots transatlantiques.
